metadata.title: USN-6472-1 -- GNU Scientific Library vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that GNU Scientific Library incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6472-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libgslcblas0 - 2.4+dfsg-6ubuntu0.1~esm1 libgsl23 - 2.4+dfsg-6ubuntu0.1~esm1 gsl-bin - 2.4+dfsg-6ubuntu0.1~esm1 libgsl-dev - 2.4+dfsg-6ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
